description.message: Gmail 창에서 바로 Dropbox 파일 및 링크를 보내고 미리 볼 수 있습니다.

onboarding_title.description: The title of the onboarding tooltip

saver_button_tooltip.description: Button to save an attachment or a link to Dropbox

saver_in_progress.description: We are currently saving attachment to dropbox, and it is still in progress.

saver_save_all_button_tooltip.description: Button to save all attachments and links to Dropbox

saver_success.description: Success message displayed if saving attachment to dropbox finished

seperator.description: List seperator, used to seperate a list of filenames, etc

short_name.description: Short name of the extension - up to 12 characters

tooltip_button.description: Button that dismisses the onboarding tooltip

tooltip_confirm.description: Text for the confirm button in onboarding tooltip

tooltip_disable.description: Text on a button to remove the chrome extension

tooltip_dismiss.description: Text for the dismiss button in onboarding tooltip

tooltip_instant.description: One of the tips in the onboarding tooltip list

tooltip_large_files.description: One of the tips in the onboarding tooltip list

tooltip_learn_more.description: Opens a tab with more information about the extension.

tooltip_title.message: 클릭 한 번으로 Dropbox 사용 가능
